# ysafe Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "izysafe" {
  token = "<base64-encoded-bytes>"
  pin   = "555555"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `pin` (String, Sensitive) The six digit password created for authenticating user.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The token data generated with the pin.
